about.title: üëã About Me
about.description: - I am 19 years old and living in Turkey. I'm in my 2nd year of electrical and electronic engineering education I also have been coding for almost 6 years. I am passionate about space, space-rockets, books, robotic coding, and back-end technologies.

skills.title: üíª Skills
skills.description: - I have been writing Python continuously for about 6 years and I am still learning various Python frameworks (Flask and MicroPython for processors). I have intermediate knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (VanillaJS, Nodejs and beginner level React) and I'm at the beginner level of C++ for Microprocessors. I have been still continuing to learn new languages and improve myself. In addition to this coding knowledge, I have intermediate-advanced proficiency in Fusion360 for 3D modeling & 3D Printing.

I am also learning how to use Docker and Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration. In addition to these, I'm learning how to use Git and GitHub effectively.
